title: Why the SNP was so important that Slovaks made it a national holiday
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
This week, we’ll dive into the history of Slovakia as we discuss the 1944 Slovak National Uprising (SNP). He might not be Slovak, but James Thomson is a history devotee and knows enough to introduce us to this period of Slovak history. We’ll also tell you where to visit to discover more about the uprising. 
  
Presenter: Peter Dlhopolec 
Photo: TASR
itunes:subtitle: This week, we’ll dive into the history of Slovaki…
